droneId.description: Drone ID the gimbal is physically connected to

status.description: Is the gimbal off or on

yawOrientation.description: Is the gimbal yaw angle related to true North to drone body

trackingMode.description: The tracking mode of the gimbal, free does no track, entity follows a defined entity, FrameEntity follows the track id position onof the image received by the sensor related to the video frame

trackedEntity.description: If trackingMode = Entity : The entity id that is tracked by the sensor

trackedVideoEntityId.description: If trackingMode= FrameEntity : The entity id of the track sent as meta data related to frame

videoURL.description: The URL of the rtsp stream from the sensor
